card.name: Obelisk of Intellect
card.text: {T}: Scry2. {3}, {T}: Draw a Card. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Obelisk of Intellect: Search your library for a card and put it into your hand.

card.name: Tesseract of the Underworld
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control you may exile it. If you do, choose one— Destroy target creature. Target player loses 3 life. Return target creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Reduce to Dust
card.text: Deathtouch At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Creatures you control have wither.

card.name: Carrier of the Burden
card.text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Other creatures with Wither you control deal double damage to players and planeswalkers.

card.name: Grimward Grinning
card.text: Create two 1/1 black and white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.) Tap up to two target creatures. Create a treasure token. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card.name: Lepidopteran Predator
card.text: Flying, Haste At the beginning of your end step, you may have Lepidopteran Predator deal 2 damage to any target. If you do, sacrifice Lepidopteran Predator.

card.name: Shinkan
card.text: Change target spell’s text by replacing all instances of the word “draw” with “discard”.

card.name: Hellguider Angel
card.text: Flying As an additional cost to cast Hellguider Angel, discard a card. Whenever Hellguider Angel attacks, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Maddened Cryptguardian
card.text: Haste Delirium — Whenever Maddened Cryptguardian deals damage, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Starborn Harpy
card.text: Flash When Starborn Harpy enters the battlefield, target creature gets Hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Pantheonic Herald
card.text: Whenever you attack with three or more Soldiers, draw a card. When Pantheonic Herald enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens on the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Crypt Break
card.text: Until end of turn, creature cards in your graveyard gain dredge X, where X is their mana value. (If you would draw a card, you may mill X cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Enter Mecha
card.text: The player with the greatest devotion to any color sacrifices three permanents. (Each any in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to any.) If you have more artifacts than any other player, you take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Greater Battleship
card.text: Trample, First strike, Non-basic landwalk (This creature can’t be blocked as long as defending player controls a non-basic land.) Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Junkyard Cruiser
card.text: Flying Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Flameproof Armor
card.text: Equipped creature has protection from instants and sorceries. (This permanent can’t be targeted or dealt damage by instants and sorceries.) Equip RR

card.name: Forgotten Megalith
card.text: When Forgotten Megalith enters the battlefield, exile another non-token creature you control. When Forgotten Megalith leaves the battlefield, return the exiled creature to play. Forgotten Megalith can’t attack or block.

card.name: Exeunt
card.text: Exile target creature. Draw a card.

card.name: Steadfast Couragemark
card.text: Enchanted creature has vigilance and lifelink.

card.name: Warding Staff
card.text: Equipped creature has hexproof. If damage would be dealt to equipped creature, prevent 1 of that damage. Equip 3

card.name: Dresdens Control
card.text: Equipped creature has “X, T: Target spell with mana value X that targets a single permanent instead targets a permanent of your choice.” Equip 2

card.name: Excision Strike
card.text: If X is 0, untap target attacking creature and remove it from combat. If X is greater than 0, instead exile target attacking creature unless its controller pays X.

card.name: Send Home
card.text: Shuffle target creature and all permanents attached to it into their owner’s libraries.

card.name: Annointed Torchbearer
card.text: Inspired — Whenever Annointed Torchbearer becomes untapped, you may pay RW. If you do, Annointed Torchbearer deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Stumble upon the Unknown
card.text: At the beginning of each players upkeep, put an exploration counter on a creature they control without an exploration counter. Then that player gains control of and untaps all creatures with exploration counters until end of turn. If every creature that player controls has an exploration counter, sacrifice Stumble upon the Unknown.

card.name: Strange Grove
card.text: Strange Grove enters the battlefield tapped. 1, T: Add 1 for each +1/+1 counter that was placed on target creature this turn.

card.name: New Threat
card.text: Each creature an opponent controls that attacked this turn and wasn’t blocked fights another creature with a different owner.

card.name: Gaze in Horror
card.text: Tap all creatures with power or toughness less than 3, those creatures don’t untap the next time they would become untapped. Creatures with power or toughness greater than 5 gain menace until end of turn.

card.name: Pathclearer Ranger
card.text: 1, T: Deal 2 damage to target creature. You lose 3 life.

card.name: Hinder Intelligence
card.text: Choose two — • Look at target opponents hand, then gain life equal to the amount of cards in their hand. • Target spell or ability that would cause a player to search their library instead causes that player to only search the top four cards of their library. • Target player shuffles their library.

card.name: Reimagined Consciousness
card.text: When Reimagined Consiousness enters the battlefield, exile a creature you control. 3U, T: Place a token copy of the exiled creature on the battlefield under your control. At the beginning of the next end step, exile the copy.

card.name: Resquite Oasis
card.text: T: Add 1 to your mana pool. 4, T: The next spell you cast this turn has split second. This ability has split second. (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can’t cast spells or activate abilities that aren’t mana abilities.)

card.name: Raise and Train
card.text: Skip your untap and draw steps. If a creature you control would leave the battlefield, instead return it to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter.

card.name: Enlightened Wisp
card.text: Deathtouch At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Creatures you control have wither.

card.name: Skilled Apprentice
card.text: Deathtouch At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Creatures you control have wither.

card.name: Temporal Teleportation
card.text: Deathtouch At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Creatures you control have wither.

card.name: Aqueous Entrapment
card.text: Deathtouch At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Creatures you control have wither.

card.name: Amplifying Cavalier
card.text: Deathtouch At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Creatures you control have wither.

card.name: Inferno Arcanist
card.text: Deathtouch At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Creatures you control have wither.

card.name: Resilient Knight
card.text: Deathtouch At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Creatures you control have wither.

card.name: Raise and Train
card.text: Skip your untap and draw steps. If a creature you control would leave the battlefield, instead return it to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter.
